citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:42 AM on April
27, 2023.
Inspectors knocked on the door, called the phone number on file, left a voicemail message, and waited 30 minutes before
departing. A facility employee spoke with inspectors and verified that the licensee was away from the facility and would
be unavailable for inspection that day. They also confirmed that they were not authorized to facilitate inspections in the
licensee's absence.
Additional Inspectors:
Mark Sanderbeck, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOR
Lauren Murphy, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:42 AM on April 
27, 2023.   
 
Inspectors knocked on the door, called the phone number on file, left a voicemail message, and waited 30 minutes before 
departing.  A facility employee spoke with inspectors and verified that the licensee was away from the facility and would 
be unavailable for inspection that day.  They also confirmed that they were not authorized to facilitate inspections in the 
licensee's absence. 
 
 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Mark Sanderbeck, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOR 
Lauren Murphy, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section
